prompt_base: cinematic portrait of an extremely muscular Japanese man, fierce expression, spiky golden-yellow hair, wearing **a torn orange cotton martial arts gi, with a blue undershirt, a blue sash belt, blue wristbands, and blue boots with yellow trim**
feature_prompt: hyperdetailed human skin texture, individual golden hair strands visible, dynamic shadows, realistic fabric weave on gi, detailed cotton texture on undershirt, robust fabric on wristbands, weathered leather texture on boots
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, illustration, plastic texture, smooth plastic hair, bright yellow hair, flat color, CGI, blurry background, low quality, childish, oversaturated, no uniform, torn pants
